comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -24,6 +24,11 @@ triblive.com###storyContent > div[data-type="float"][data-stn-player]
 !##################
 !
 ! Ad-Shield ad reinsertion
+!#if (adguard_ext_safari || adguard_app_ios || adguard_ext_android_cb)
+##a[href*=".xyz/"] img[src*="html-load.com"]
+##a[href*=".xyz/"] + img[src*="html-load.com"]
comment.body: I know and this is expected. I'm trying to just mitigate damage here, as totally hiding them 100% triggers anti-adblock detection.
